header.description: No header-level scalar tokens; report has no top-level summary fields.

rows.description: Each row represents a single gateway record from app_gateways table with all configuration and metadata fields.

semantics: All tokens are direct column pass-throughs from the app_gateways table. No parameter-based filtering is required; optional date-range filters may be applied using the created_at column.
transformations: No reshaping, melting, or unions required â€” all tokens map 1:1 to app_gateways columns.
